title: 820-01041 No boot but 20V on usb-c
message:
Hi,
i have this board very clean, no liquid, stop to work in use.
i have the 20V on usb-c, the current is cycling between 0,029A and 0,600A
PPBUS_G3H =10,92V too low no? battery+power supply.
PP3V3_G3H_RTC_X=3,39
PP3V3_G3H_RTC_T=3,36
PP3V3_S5 missing not short
PP1V8_S5 missing not short
PM_SLP_S5=0V
i need help, is it ppbus_G3h too low? or another thing?
thanks

title: 820-01041 No boot but 20V on usb-c
message:
ALWAYS check PPBUS_G3H WITHOUT battery.
If battery is connected, PPBUS_G3H is automatically adjusted, accordingly with battery charge level.

Do you get SLPS2R voltages?
Try to put in DFU restore mode.

title: 820-01041 No boot but 20V on usb-c
message:
i try to put in DFU but i have an error when i try to restore, i attach the message.
i have PP1V8_SLPS2R=1,78V , PP0V8_SLPS2R=0,8V but not PP1V1_SLPS2R=0V

title: 820-01041 No boot but 20V on usb-c
message:
"not PP1V1_SLPS2R=0V"
There is a problem then.
Check diode mode to ground first.

title: 820-01041 No boot but 20V on usb-c
message:
Read more posts about DFU restore.
Many people complain, not easy to get it done so fast.
Try all the tricks they mentioned.

title: 820-01041 No boot but 20V on usb-c
message: I try again in DFU with another macbook pro, i have always the same error.
